name: Words Scramble
description:
Words Scramble
Swap letters to unscramble words in this fun app. The letters are all laid out and all you have to do is decipher the words describing the beautiful images. So what are you waiting for, challenge yourself with a great combination of words and pictures. You also get to build your vocabulary on the way!

Features:
•More than 150 real life pictures.
•Option of skipping puzzle
•Option of revealing or deleting letters.
•Choose soundtrack from 5 soothing musical scores.
•Track high scores across friends, opponents, and the world with enabled leaderboards.
•Share images of solved puzzles with friends on Facebook
